A "Smart Sleeping Bag" that can monitor your sleep quality and adjust the temperature accordingly to ensure a restful night's sleep.
A "Portable Camping Bed" that turns into a sleeping bag when not in use, making it perfect for outdoor adventures.
A "Heated Sleeping Bag" that uses technology to keep you warm even in extreme cold temperatures.
A "Multifunctional Sleep sack" that doubles as a pillow, blanket, and even a small tent for added comfort.
A "Self-inflating Sleeping Bag" that automatically inflates and deflates, making it easy to pack and transport.
